docs.lead_paragraph: The solvency of a hospital fund was extended by 12 years as a result of the health care law, trustees said.

headline.main: Law Will Extend Medicare Fund, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Medicare Fund Will Last 12 Years Longer Because of Health Overhaul, Trustees Say

docs.snippet: The solvency of a hospital fund was extended by 12 years as a result of the health care law, trustees said.

docs.lead_paragraph: Eight years ago, researchers at Columbia University worried a lot of new parents when they concluded that children whose mothers left home for full-time work in the first year of life were cognitively delayed compared with one-year-olds whose mothers stayed home. (No, the study did not measure the effect of working fathers.)

headline.main: Working Moms Are Fine for Kids

docs.abstract: Researchers are telling mothers to relax
docs.snippet: Researchers are telling mothers to relax

docs.abstract: Having a mother work during the first year of her child's life is not necessarily a bad thing for the child, a new study finds.
docs.snippet: Having a mother work during the first year of her child's life is not necessarily a bad thing for the child, a new study finds.
